articles.title: John Kerry knighted in England by King Charles for climate change efforts
articles.description:
The diplomat, who served as Biden’s climate envoy, was bestowed the award for “services to tackling climate change.”

The post John Kerry knighted in England by King Charles for climate change efforts appeared first on Boston.com.
